isInitialized(address).details: Returns if the module was already initialized for a provided smartaccount

isModuleType(uint256).details: Returns boolean value if module is a certain type

params.moduleTypeId: the module type ID according the ERC-7579 spec MUST return true if the module is of the given type and false otherwise

onInstall(bytes).details: This function is called by the smart account during installation of the module

params.data: arbitrary data that may be required on the module during `onInstall` initialization MUST revert on error (i.e. if module is already enabled)

onUninstall(bytes).details: This function is called by the smart account during uninstallation of the module

params.data: arbitrary data that may be required on the module during `onUninstall` de-initialization MUST revert on error
